explains: vt. 选择（choose 的过去分词）
adj. 挑选出来的，精选的
wordGroup: choose from 挑选，从…中选择
as you choose 随你的便
choose to do 选择去做某事
cannot choose but 只得；只好；不得不

sentences.en: She was chosen for the first eleven.
She was disappointed not to be chosen.
sentences.cn: 她没有被选中感到很沮丧。

sentences.en: The victims were not chosen arbitrarily.
sentences.cn: 这些受害者不是被随意选的。
